Elsewhere, it's not that simple.
Pin Yin:
chúle zhèli, méi nàme jiǎndān.
(also mei you)

English: The teacher teaches English to us.
I teach English at a university.
I would like to teach history.
Do you teach English?
She teaches the Chinese language.
I teach the Chinese language.
My friend teaches Chinese.
Who taught her how to speak English?
Pin Yin: shì shéi jiāo tā zěnme shuō yīngyǔ de ?
Chinese: 是谁教她怎么说英语的？

English: You must start at once.
The exam needs to start very soon.
Mom works in a hospital.
Please don't cry.
I want to cry.
I'll tell you directly, ok?
How are you lately?
You need to believe in your own ability.
Pin Yin: Nǐ yào xiāngxìn zìjǐ de nénglì.

English: He succeeded.
He wishes that he already succeeded.
I am sure that he will be successful (at sth).
Pin Yin: wǒ kěndìng tā huì chénggōng de. (also que ding)

English: My mother is very busy.
My papa is busy.
Are you busy today?
Do you need my help? (with your undertaking)
Pin Yin: Xūyào wǒ bāng nǐ de máng ma?

English: She needs help.
I love my mother.
Her mother will continue to work.
Pin Yin: tā mǔqīn jiāng jìxù gōngzuò . (also yao4)

English: You should study hard.
Chinese people work very hard.
He doesn't work hard.
He works very hard.
You worked too hard.
Pin Yin: nǐ gōngzuò tài nǔlì le. (also ni tai nuli gongzuo le)

English: You are too good, Willie answered.
Pin Yin: nǐ tài hǎo le .Willie huídá dào .

English: Each of them is very hard-working.
Pin Yin: Tāmen měi gè rén dōu hěn nǔlì.

English: I didn't know about this matter.
Pin Yin: Wǒ bù zhīdào zhè jiàn shì.

English: I don't know, and I don't want to.
Pin Yin: wǒ bùzhī dào , yě bù xiǎng zhīdào .

English: How can you not know?
I don't know if I still have it.
Pin Yin: wǒ bùzhī dào wǒ hái yǒu méiyǒu .

English: Do I have any other options?
Pin Yin: wǒ hái yǒu qítā xuǎnzé ma? (also qita de)

English: I don't know what I should do anymore!
Pin Yin: wǒ zàiyě bù zhīdào gāi zuò shénme le.
Chinese: 我再也不知道该做什么了。

English:
Will you come to China again?
Maybe.
Pin Yin:
Nǐ huì zài lái Zhōngguó ma?
Kěnéng.

English: If he put in just a little more effort, he might have already succeeded.
Pin Yin: rúguǒ tā zài nǔlì yīdiǎn, jiù kěnéng yǐjīng chénggōng le .
Chinese: 如果他再努力一点，就可能已经成功了。

English: Something might have happened to her.
Pin Yin: tā kěnéng chū shénme shì le. (also fasheng)

English: You may have heard.
If at that time, he had worked a little harder, he would have succeeded.
Pin Yin: rúguǒ tā dāngshí zài nǔlì yīdiǎn, tā jiù chénggōng le.
Chinese: 如果他当时再努力一点，他就成功了。

English: Please come to my home.
This (exam/homework problem) is very difficult.
Of course it's not a problem!
She told me that her mother had bought it for her.
Pin Yin: tā gàosu wǒ tā māma mǎi gěi tā le .
Chinese: 她告诉我她妈妈买给她了。

English: What's the date today?
What month is next month?
Pin Yin: Xià gè yuè shì jǐ yuè?

English: She'll give birth next month.
Pin Yin: Tā xià gè yuè shēng háizi.

English: That company shut down.

Pin Yin: wǒ néng wèn yīxiē wèntí ma ?

English: When she comes back you can ask her
Pin Yin: děng tā huílai de shíhou wèn wèn tā .
Chinese: 等她回来的时候问问她。

English: I have been waiting for a friend of mine for an hour.
Pin Yin: wǒ děng wǒ de yī ge péngyou děng le yī xiǎoshí .
Chinese: 我等我的一个朋友等了一小时。

English: I can only wait.
Pin Yin: wǒ zhǐ néng děng le. (also zhihao)

English: American history is not interesting.

Pin Yin: wǒ xiǎng zhīdào zhèjùhuà de yìsi .
Chinese: 我想知道这句话的意思。

English: This novel is not interesting.
Pin Yin: Zhè běn xiǎoshuō méi yǒu yìsi.

English: Did you guys understand what I mean?
Pin Yin: Nǐmen míngbai wǒ de yìsi le ma? (no le ok)
Chinese: 你们明白我的意思了吗？

English: I'll tell you guys a story.
Pin Yin: Wǒ gěi nǐmen jiǎng yī gè gùshi.

English: Nobody deeply understands me.
I teach English at a high school.
I already asked everyone.
Pin Yin: Wǒ yǐjīng wèn guò měi yī gè rén le.
Chinese: 我已经问过每一个人了。

English: Other than me, there was no one there.
Pin Yin: nàr, chúle wǒ, yī gè rén dōu méiyǒu .
Chinese: 那儿除了我，一个人都没有。

English: And, yours is over there.
I have several dozens of them.
You should decide whether we will go there or not.
Pin Yin: gāi yóu nǐ lái juédìng wǒmen qù bù qù nàr .
Chinese: 该由你来决定我们去不去那儿。

English: I just want to love one person really well.
Pin Yin: Wǒ zhǐ xiǎng hǎohǎo ài yī gè rén.
Chinese: 我只想好好儿爱一个人。

English: Work really hard, and you can pass the examination.
Pin Yin: hǎohǎo nǔlì, nǐ jiù néng tōngguò kǎoshì .
Chinese: 好好努力，你就能通过考试。

English: This is my room.
Don't look into my room.
Pin Yin: bùyào wǎng wǒ fángjiān lǐ kàn. (also xiang4)

English: I am going back to my room☺, I can study there.
Pin Yin: wǒ yào huí fángjiān le, zài nàr wǒ kěyǐ xuéxí.
Chinese: 我要回房间了，在那儿我可以学习。

English: What is my room number?
Pin Yin: wǒ de fángjiān hào shì duōshao?

English: He knows this teacher. (polite)
Do you know the teacher?
I want to see this movie.
Pin Yin: wǒ xiǎng kàn zhè bù diànyǐng .

English: He will go buy a television.
Do you like to watch TV?
I don't like to watch TV.

Nobody believes what I say.
Nobody believed what I said.
This is your computer.
Whose computer is this?
This is a secondary problem.
She is a doctor.

Are you a doctor?
No, I'm not. I'm a teacher.
Pin Yin:
Nǐ shì yīshēng ma?
Bú shì. Wǒ shì lǎoshī.
Chinese:
A你是医生吗?
B不是。我是老师。

English: We arrived here fast, didn't we?
Pin Yin: wǒmen hěn kuài jiù dào zhèr le, bù shì ma?
Chinese: 我们很快就到这儿了，不是吗？

English: You can buy whichever you like, but not both.
Pin Yin: nǐ kěyǐ mǎi nǐ xǐhuān de nà ge , ér bù shì liǎng ge dōu mǎi .
Chinese: 你可以买你喜欢的那个，而不是两个都买。

English: If I had known sooner that were you here, I would have come at once.
Pin Yin:
rúguǒ wǒ zǎo zhīdào nǐ zài zhèr dehuà, wǒ mǎshàng jiù lái le.
(also wo jiu mashang...)
Chinese: 如果我早知道你在这儿的话，我马上就来了。

English: If I had known earlier, I wouldn't have talked with her like this.
Pin Yin: rúguǒ wǒ zǎo zhīdào, wǒ bù huì gēn tā shuō zhèzhǒng huà .
Chinese: 如果我早知道，我不会跟她说这种话。

English: What study method do you use?
Let me introduce my good friend.
Pin Yin: Ràng wǒ jièshào yīxià wǒ de hǎopéngyou.
Chinese: 让我介绍一下我的好朋友。

English: He's got an opportunity.
Pin Yin: Tā huòdé le yī gè jīhuì.

English: She's just bought a car.
Pin Yin: Tā gāng mǎile yī liàng chē.

English: Next month is February.

Pin Yin: lǎoshī bù kěnéng shuō guò zhè yàng de shì .
Chinese: 老师不可能说过这样的事。

English: Everyone, please do some research on this problem.
Pin Yin: Zhè gè wèntí, qǐng dàjiā yánjiū yīxià.
Chinese: 这个问题，请大家研究一下。

English: Yesterday, he left Beijing and went to Shanghai.
Pin Yin: Zuótiān tā líkāi Běijīng qù Shànghǎi le.
Chinese: 昨天他离开北京去上海了。

English: They saw a movie yesterday.
Was Ken at home yesterday?
She saw a big, tall man yesterday.
Pin Yin: tā zuótiān kànjiàn yī ge gāodà de nánrén .
Chinese: 她昨天看见一个高大的男人。

English: Please be seated.
She likes little dogs.
That dog is very cute.
I have a little dog.
Pin Yin: Wǒ yǒu yī zhī xiǎo gǒu.

English: Ken's dog is very big.
These two little dogs are really cute.
Pin Yin: Zhè liǎng zhī xiǎo gǒu zhēn kě'ài. (no zhexie, because you know it's 2)

English: How old is she this year?
They went to see a love movie.
Pin Yin: Tāmen qù kàn le yī bù àiqíng diànyǐng.
Chinese: 他们去看了一部爱情电影。

English: Everybody plays the game of love.
Thank you!
Thanks for your answer. (polite)
Thank you for your help. (polite)
Thank you for helping me. "It's nothing"
Pin Yin: xièxie nǐ bāng le wǒ. méi shénme.

English: Without you, I couldn't have done it. Thank you.
Pin Yin: méiyǒu nǐ, wǒ wúfǎ zuòdào, xièxie .
Chinese: 没有你我无法做到，谢谢。

English: I can't believe my eyes.
Pin Yin: wǒ wúfǎ xiāngxìn zìjǐ de yǎnjing .
Chinese: 我无法相信自己的眼睛。

English: Such a method will not solve this problem.
Pin Yin: Zhè zhǒng bànfǎ wúfǎ jiějué zhè gè wèntí.
Chinese: 这种办法无法解决这个问题。

English: He is a professor.
Let me know if I need to make any changes.
Pin Yin: ràng wǒ zhīdào wǒ shìfǒu xūyào gǎibiàn .
Chinese: 让我知道我是否需要改变。

English: I don't understand Chinese.
I don't understand what the teacher says.
Pin Yin: Wǒ tīng bù dǒng lǎoshī shuōde huà.

English: I don't understand what he's saying.
Pin Yin: Wǒ tīng bù dǒng tā shuōde huà.

English: I understand.
I understand.

Pin Yin: wǒ dàgài dǒng le. (also ming bai)

English: Someone went in.
Let me in.
I dropped/lost my money.
You finally gonna go, or not?
This matter is finally solved.
Pin Yin: Zhè jiàn shìqing dàodǐ shì jiějué le.
Chinese: 这件事情到底是解决了。

English: There are only two people who know this matter.
Pin Yin: Zhǐ yǒu liǎngge rén zhīdào zhèjiàn shìqing.
Chinese: 只有两个人知道这件事情。

English: He runs very fast.
That student runs fast, doesn't he?
Pin Yin: nà ge xuésheng pǎo de hěn kuài, bù shì ma ?
Chinese: 那个学生跑得很快，不是吗？

English: He runs really fast.

Pin Yin: Bill pǎo de bǐ Bob kuài .

English: This dog runs really really really fast!
Pin Yin: zhè gǒu pǎo de duō kuài ā !

English: He ran as fast as he could.
Pin Yin: tā pǎo de néng yǒu duō kuài jiù yǒu duō kuài .
Chinese: 他跑得能有多快就有多快。

English: I've run three miles.

Pin Yin: Tā pǎo le yī duàn lù.

English: Horses run really fast.

Pin Yin: bùguǎn wèn le shénme , tā dōu néng huídá .
Chinese: 不管问了什么，她都能回答。

English: Anybody is (in the general case) better than nobody.
Pin Yin: bùguǎn shì shéi zǒng bǐ méi rén hǎo.

English: He has more money than he can spend.
Pin Yin: tā yǒu huā bù wán de qián.

English: These flowers are very pretty.
Her eyes are pretty.
Your clothes are very pretty.
That is a pretty place.
Pin Yin: Nàli shì gè piàoliang de dìfang.

English: Are you afraid of heights?

He's afraid of dogs.
He is afraid of dogs.

Chinese: 我会安排一下，叫个人去你家接你。

English: A room has been arranged for you. (polite)
Pin Yin: Fángjiān wèi nín ānpái hǎo le.

English: I never saw this movie before.
Pin Yin: Wǒ yǐqián méi kànguò zhè gè diànyǐng.
Chinese: 我以前没看过这个电影。

English: I'll already be gone before you come back.
Pin Yin: nǐ huílai zhīqián wǒ yǐjīng zǒu le.
Chinese: 你回来之前我已经走了。

English:
It won't start before eight-thirty.
It doesn't start before eight thirty.
What do you think I've been doing?
Pin Yin: nǐ juéde wǒ zhīqián zài zuò shénme?  (also shi4 zai4 ..)
Chinese: 你觉得我之前在做什么？

English: He asked me to arrive at the company before three o'clock.
Pin Yin: Tā yāoqiú wǒ sān diǎn zhīqián dào gōngsī.
Chinese: 他要求我三点之前到公司。

English: The game has begun.
We're in a meeting right now.

Are you coming to the meeting?
I'm coming.
There's a policeman over there.
The police have come.
I'm reading.
She said that she was happy/blessed.
Pin Yin: tā shuō le tā hěn xìngfú .

English: I feel very happy/blessed.
Their lives are happy/blessed.
Our life is very happy/blessed.
They live a happy/blessed life.
Pin Yin: tāmen shēnghuó de hěn xìngfú. (also de shenghuo)

English: Give me a phone call.
When he gets back, shall I have him call you? Yes, thanks.
Pin Yin:
děng tā huílai, wǒ yào ràng tā gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà ma? shì de, xièxie.
(also ta huilai de shihou)
Chinese: “等他回来，我要让他给你打电话吗？”“是的，谢谢。”

English: I should give her a phone call.
Pin Yin: Wǒ yīnggāi gěi tā dǎ diànhuà.

English:
Did you call me yesterday?
Yes. You didn't answer the phone.
Pin Yin:
Nǐ zuótiān gěi wǒ dǎ diànhuà le ma?
Duì à. Nǐ bù jiē diànhuà.
Chinese:
A你昨天给我打电话了吗?
B对啊。你不接电话。

English: She had just arrived home when I called.
Pin Yin: wǒ dǎ diànhuà de shíhou, tā gāng huídào jiā.
Chinese: 我打电话的时候，她刚回到家。

English: Can I give him a phone call?
Pin Yin: Wǒ kěyǐ gěi tā dǎ diànhuà ma?

English: Please give him a phone call.
Please give me a phone call.
Can I give you a phone call?
Pin Yin: Wǒ kěyǐ gěi nǐ dǎ diànhuà ma?

English: I know where he lives.
I wonder where she has gone.
Pin Yin: wǒ xiǎng zhīdào tā qù nǎr le .

English: God knows where he has gone.
He gave us not only clothes but some money.
Pin Yin: tā bùjǐn gěi le wǒmen yīfu, hái yǒu yīdiǎn qián .
Chinese: 他不仅给了我们衣服，还有一点钱。

English: He will be at home tomorrow.
I need to know by tomorrow.
Is he able to come tomorrow?
What will you be doing at this time tomorrow?
Pin Yin: nǐ míngtiān zhè gè shíhou huì shì zài zuò shénme? (also no shi)
Chinese: 你明天这个时候会是在做什么？

English: I am first place!
Pin Yin: Wǒ shì dì yī míng. (also no shi, lazy)

English: He achieved first place.
Pin Yin: Tā dédào dì yī míng. (also dedao le)

English: The meeting has begun.
The meeting was over at nine o'clock.
The game is not over yet.
His work for this day is over.
Pin Yin: Tā jiéshù le zhè tiān de gōngzuò.

English: She hasn't heard this news yet.
Pin Yin: tā hái méi tīng dào zhè gè xiāoxi .

English: Hearing news of her success, he was very happy.
Pin Yin: tīngdào tā chénggōng de xiāoxi, tā hěn gāoxìng.
Chinese: 听到她成功的消息，他很高兴。

English: This news made her happy.
Pin Yin: zhè xiāoxi ràng tā hěn gāoxìng .

English: Steve looked very happy.
I'm very very happy.
She feels very happy.
Glad to be at your service. (polite)
You appear to be really happy.
He looks very young.
My mother looks young.
Chinese: 我的妈妈看起来很年轻。

English: When you're young, reading many good books is a good thing.
Pin Yin:
niánqīng de shíhou duō kàn diǎn hǎo shū shì jiàn hǎo shì.
(also kan yi dian)  (no kan hen dou hao shu ... means few is bad)
Chinese: 年轻的时候多看点好书是件好事。

English: Please explain it again (polite)
You want me to explain it to you ... impossible!
Pin Yin: yào wǒ jiěshì gěi nǐ tīng shì bù kěnéng de .
Chinese: 要我解释给你听是不可能的。

English: I can't explain it either.
Can I be friends with you?
Pin Yin: Kěyǐ hé nǐ jiāo ge péngyou ma?

English: Do you like your coworkers?
My coworker doesn't have a computer.
I very much like my coworkers.
Is your coworker an American?
Pin Yin: Nǐ de tóngshì shì Měiguórén ma?

English: My coworker has a cell phone.
When will your coworker come to China?
Pin Yin: Nǐde tóngshì shénme shíhòu lái Zhōngguó?
Chinese: 你的同事什么时候来中国？

English: He came here for what purpose?
Pin Yin: tā lái zhèli de mùdì shì shénme ?
Chinese: 他来这里的目的是什么？

English: She's young and beautiful.
She's young and beautiful.
Allow me to introduce you, these are my parents.
Pin Yin: Ràng wǒ lái jièshào yíxià, zhè shì wǒ fùmǔ.
Chinese: 让我来介绍一下,这是我父母。

English: My parents aren't old yet.
I will forever love my parents.

What is your work?
I am a journalist.
Pin Yin:
Nǐde gōngzuò shì shénme?
Wǒ shì jìzhě.
Chinese:
A你的工作是什么?
B我是记者。

English: I live next to school.
Pin Yin: Wǒ zhù zài xuéxiào de pángbiān.

English: The man sitting next to me spoke to me.
Pin Yin: zuòzài wǒ pángbiān de nánrén gēn wǒ shuōhuà le .
Chinese: 坐在我旁边的男人跟我说话了。

English: I sat by his side.
Pin Yin: wǒ zuò zài tā pángbiān. (also de)

English: When will you go to Hong Kong?
Pin Yin: Nǐ shénme shíhòu yào qù Xiānggǎng?

English: The flowers are fragrant.
She's sleeping soundly.
Except for him, the other people all slept.
Pin Yin: Chúle tā, lìngwài de jǐ gè rén dōu shuì le.
Chinese: 除了他，另外的几个人都睡了。

English: We've graduated!
First I want to talk about…
Pin Yin: Shǒuxiān wǒ yào tán de shì ……

English: They left there the day before yesterday.
Let me consider a bit.
They're discussing some problems.
This problem is being discussed now.
Pin Yin: zhè wèntí zhèngzài bèi tǎolùn. (zhege is better)

English: This is believed to be an important matter.
Pin Yin: zhè bèi rènwéi shì yī jiàn dàshì.

English: My son can walk!
Without a car, he can only walk.
Let's go play.
It's too hot.
She's my older sister.
When will your older sister come to China?
Pin Yin: Nǐ jiějie shénme shíhòu lái Zhōngguó?
Chinese: 你姐姐什么时候来中国？

English: Let me introduce my older sister.
Pin Yin: Ràng wǒ jièshào yī xià wǒ jiějie.

English: Do you know my older sister?
Few people think so.
His room is a mess.
Excuse me, where can I go online?
They insist that he should go.
My father insisted that I go to that place and take a look.
Pin Yin: wǒ bàba jiānchí yào wǒ qù nà dìfang kànkan .
Chinese: 我爸爸坚持要我去那地方看看。

English: He still insists he is correct. (formal)
Pin Yin: Tā réngrán jiānchí tā shì duì de.

English: I'll call you around five o'clock.
Pin Yin: wǒ huì zài 5 diǎn zuǒyòu dǎ diàn huà gěi nǐ .
Chinese: 我会在5点左右打电话给你。

English: How many languages do you speak?
Pin Yin: Nǐ huì shuō jǐ zhǒng yǔyán?

English: I don't know this city, and what's more, I don't understand the language there.
Pin Yin: wǒ bùzhī dào zhè gè chéngshì, érqiě wǒ yīdiǎn dōu bù dǒng nàli de yǔyán.
Chinese: 我不知道这个城市，而且我一点都不懂那里的语言。

English: She's in the middle.
I've been to Beijing.
I have been to the United States.
I haven't been to China.
Have you been to Shanghai?
I have been to Beijing.
I haven't been to the United States.
Why haven't you been to Shanghai?
I haven't been to Beijing.
I have been to Shanghai.
Have you been to Beijing?
Have you been to China?
Have you been to the United States?
The car won't go.
Let's get off here, ok!

I'll get off at the next station.
I'm getting off at the next station.
I am getting off at the next station.

English: Who built this?

Tā huáiyí shìqing chūle wèntí.

Chinese: “你想再来点咖啡吗？”“不，谢谢。我够了。”

English: You drank too much coffee.

Pin Yin: Tiān shàng yǒu tàiyáng, què xià zhe yǔ, zhēn qíguài. (also tiankong)

English:
Is the director coming?

Zhǔrèn lái ma?

A主任来吗？

A您会说中文吗?

yīdàn gōngzuò wánchéng, wǒ jiù cóng zhèr líkāi.

This shop is open from 9 to 6 o'clock.

English: They're studying in the library.
They provided the library with many books.
Pin Yin: tāmen gěi túshūguǎn tígōng le hěn duō shū .
Chinese: 他们给图书馆提供了很多书。

English: I'm going to the library to look for some information.
I'm going to the library to return the books.
I very much appreciate his performance at work.
Pin Yin: Wǒ hěn xīnshǎng tā gōngzuò de biǎoxiàn.
Chinese: 我很欣赏他工作的表现。

English: She's reading the publicity information.
He is a PhD in Economics.
I gave up the opportunity to study for a doctorate.
Pin Yin: Wǒ fàngqì dú bóshì de jīhuì. (also du -> nian (dialect))

English: There are not many foreigners.
I would never have thought of it.
Pin Yin: wǒ cónglái jiù méi xiǎng dào. (also conglai dou bu hui)

English: I've never felt that good.
Pin Yin: wǒ cónglái méi gǎnjué nàme hǎo guò.
Chinese: 我从来没感觉那么好过。

English: You never have time to deal with important things.
Pin Yin: nǐ cónglái méi shíjiān chǔlǐ zhòngyào de shìqing.
Chinese: 你从来没时间处理重要的事情！

English: Regarding him, we will deal with it again tomorrow.
Pin Yin: Zhìyú tā, wǒmen míngtiān zài chǔlǐ. (also duiyu, but zhiyu says contrast)
Chinese: 至于他，我们明天再处理。

English: Regarding this last issue, I definitely don't understand.
Pin Yin: Zhìyú zuìhòu zhè gè wèntí, wǒ bìng bù liǎojiě. (also duiyu, but zhiyu says contrast)
Chinese: 至于最后这个问题，我并不了解。

English: He always borrows things, but never returns them.
Pin Yin: Tā zǒnɡshì jiè dōngxi, dànshì cónglái dōu bù huán.
Chinese: 他总是借东西，但是从来都不还。

English: I returned the books I borrowed from the library, and borrowed some new ones.
Pin Yin: wǒ huán le cóng túshūguǎn jiè de shū, yòu jiè le xiē xīn de .
Chinese: 我还了从图书馆借的书，又借了些新的。

English: If you need a pen, I'll lend you one.
Pin Yin: rúguǒ nǐ xūyào bǐ dehuà, wǒ jiè nǐ yī zhī .
Chinese: 如果你需要笔的话，我借你一支。

Pin Yin: zhè zhī bǐ hé wǒ zuótiān diào de nà zhī yīyàng.
Chinese: 这支笔和我昨天掉的那支一样。

English: Could you lend Ms. He some money?
Pin Yin: Nǐ néng jiè Hé xiǎojiě yīdiǎn qián ma? (also yi bi qian)
Chinese: 你能借何小姐一点钱吗？

English: Ms. He promised to pay me back next month.
Pin Yin: Hé xiǎojiě bǎozhèng xià gè yuè huán wǒ qián.
Chinese: 何小姐保证下个月还我钱。

English: Since the problem has already happened, we should just deal with it.
Pin Yin: Jìrán wèntí yǐjīng fāshēng le, jiù yīnggāi chǔlǐ wèntí.
Chinese: 既然问题已经发生了，就应该处理问题。

English: Since you promised to help him, then you just need to do it.
Pin Yin: Jìrán dāying bāng tā, nàme jiù yào zuòdào.
Chinese: 既然答应帮他，那么就要做到。

English: She promise to meet him at what time?
They walk very slowly.
Tom speaks more slowly than Bill.
He does things slowly.
He sticks to his principles when doing things.
Pin Yin: Tā zuò shì hěn jiǎng yuánzé.

English: That company is managed very well.
Pin Yin: Nà jiā gōngsī jīngyíng de hěn hǎo.

English: The square is very big.

He rode his bicycle there.
He went by bicycle.
It's dark outside.
You must come back before it gets dark.
Pin Yin: nǐ bìxū zài tiān hēi qián huílai .

English: I don't like to go out after dark.
Pin Yin: wǒ tiān hēi hòu bù xǐhuān chūmén .

English: She is a magazine editor.
Really annoying!
Sorry to bother you, help me open the door? (polite)
Pin Yin: Máfan nín, bāng wǒ kāi xià mén. (xia short for yixia)

English: His bag is right here, so he can't have already gone to school.
Pin Yin: tā de bāo jiù zài zhèr, suǒyǐ tā bù kěnéng yǐjīng qù le xuéxiào .
Chinese: 他的包就在这儿，所以他不可能已经去了学校。

English: This letter was sent to the wrong place.
Pin Yin: zhè fēng xìn jì cuò dìfang le.

Please write to tell me your situation at school.
Pin Yin: qǐng xiěxìn gàosu wǒ nǐmen xuéxiào de qíngkuàng.
Chinese: 请写信告诉我你们学校的情况。

English: Father is busy now writing letters.
Pin Yin: fùqin zhèng máng zhe xiě xìn.

English: The colleagues are discussing a plan of action.
Pin Yin: Tóngshìmen zài tǎolùn fāng'àn. (also yi xiang fangan)

English: Then, this is our plan of action.
Pin Yin: Na, zhè jiù shì wǒmen de fāng'àn.

English: He explained his own plan of action.
Pin Yin: Tā jiěshì le zìjǐ de fāng'àn.

English: Both sides agreed to this plan of action.
Pin Yin: Shuāngfāng tóngyì le zhè xiàng fāng'àn. (also dou tongyi ...)

English: He successfully completed this task.
Pin Yin: Tā chénggōng de wánchéng le zhè xiàng rènwu.
Chinese: 他成功地完成了这项任务。

English: It's difficult for one person to complete this task.
Pin Yin: Yī gè rén wánchéng zhè xiàng rènwu hěn kùnnan.
Chinese: 一个人完成这项任务很困难。

English: To finish it in one day is practically impossible.
Pin Yin: zài yī tiān zhīnèi wánchéng tā jīhū shì bù kěnéng de .
Chinese: 在一天之内完成它几乎是不可能的。

English: Korean culture is not interesting.
Those students are Korean.
Korea is small.
Korea is not big.

Your health status is fine.

Pin Yin: Tā zài dàxué shòudào le liánghǎo de jiàoyù.
Chinese: 他在大学受到了良好的教育。

English: The relationship between those two nations is very special.
Pin Yin: Nà liǎng guó guānxì hěn tèshū.

English: The teacher announced the time of the exam.
Pin Yin: Lǎoshī xuānbù le kǎoshì de shíjiān.
Chinese: 老师宣布了考试的时间。

English: The host announced the start of the meeting.
He looks a bit silly.

Pin Yin: Duì zhè jiàn shì, tā jiānchí zìjǐ de zuòfǎ. (Also zhiyu)
Chinese: 对这件事，他坚持自己的做法。

English: I like to drink (alcohol)
Young people like to go to bars and drink.
Pin Yin: Niánqīng rén xǐhuan qù jiǔbā hē jiǔ.
Chinese: 年轻人喜欢去酒吧喝酒。

English: My daddy doesn't drink "My daddy also doesn't"
Pin Yin: wǒ bàba bù hē jiǔ. wǒ bàba yě bù hē.
Chinese: “我爸爸不喝酒。”“我爸爸也不喝。”

English: You can't drink alcohol when you drive.
I like the color yellow.

English: I'm going to return to my country.
She's going to return to his country.

Next month.
Chinese:
A你什么时候回国？
B下个月。

English: We've been waiting a long time.

I haven't seen him for a very long time!

English: This is a very old photo.

Pin Yin: Wǒ hé péngyou yuē zài zhèlǐ jiànmiàn.

Pin Yin: Tā hěn jiǔ yǐqián jiù xué guò zhōngwén.

English: I hate you.

Pin Yin: Shàng gè zhōumò, wǒ shàngkè le. (also no ge)

English: Stable politics bring a stable economy.

English: He's very pitiful.

English: Her car is parked by the road.
Pin Yin: Tā de chē tíng zài lù biān.

English: There are many trees alongside the road.

English: Trees have roots.

English: The matter is too complicated!

English: International problems are very very complicated.

Pin Yin: Tāmen yījiā dōu yímín dào Zhōngguó le.

English: I have run for approximately 13 seconds.
Pin Yin: Wǒ dàgài pǎo le shísān miǎo.

English: There are many tools on the desk/table.

English: If the weather allows, we will set off in an hour.
Pin Yin: rúguǒ tiānqì yǔnxǔ dehuà, wǒmen yī xiǎoshí hòu chūfā .

English: Why is she going to the train station?

Pin Yin: wǒ bàba duì wǒ de ài hé zhàogu bù bǐ wǒ māma shǎo.

English: I'm sorry, I can't stay long.

English: That's the location of the problem☺.

Pin Yin: Bàba měi nián dōu sòng wǒ shēngrì lǐwù. (also yi fen)

English: Has she already seen the contract?

English: This problem should be solved thoroughly.

English: Your son is very smart. (polite)

Pin Yin: Tā xiángxì de gàosu le wǒ shìqing de jīngguò.

English: I rent my house.
Did you rent a house/apartment?

English: He's too fat.

English: Don't believe a man whose past you don't understand anything about.

English: The regular eight o'clock bus arrived early today.
Pin Yin: 8 diǎn nà bānchē jīntiān zǎo dào le .

English: The structure of these houses is very simple.

English: He eats too much, he's getting more and more fat.

English: I will live in Dalian.

Pin Yin: Wǒ rènwéi Dàlián shì gè gānjìng de chéngshì. (also shi zuo)

Pin Yin: Nǐ shénme shíhòu yào qù Dàlián?

How's Dalian?

English: He earned as much money as possible.

English: Very regrettably, my students don't have too many opportunities to practice speaking English.
Pin Yin: Hěn kěxī, wǒ de xuésheng méiyǒu tài duō jīhuì liànxí shuō Yīngyǔ.
Chinese: 很可惜，我的学生没有太多机会练习说英语。

English: It's important to practice daily.
This is a good opportunity to practice English.
Pin Yin: Zhè shì yī gè liànxí Yīngyǔ de hǎo jīhuì.
Chinese: 这是一个练习英语的好机会。

English: On what grounds do you ask me to go?
Pin Yin: nǐ píng shénme jiào wǒ zǒu?

English: To study Chinese, you need to speak a lot, and practice lot, then it's ok.
Pin Yin: Xué hànyǔ, yào duō shuō, duō liànxí, cái xíng.
Chinese: 学汉语要多说，多练习才行。

English: The student(s) received encouragement.
My teacher encourages me to study Chinese well.
Pin Yin: Lǎoshī gǔlì wǒ xuéhǎo hànyǔ. (no laoshi xiang wo ...)

English: She's hiding behind a tree.
Please pour me a glass of water.
Pin Yin: Qǐng tì wǒ dào bēi shuǐ.

English: She takes the subway train to work.
I'll tell you a secret.
Pin Yin: Wǒ gàosu nǐ yī gè mìmì.

English: He told her secret to his friends.
Pin Yin: tā bǎ tā de mìmì gàosu le tā de péngyou .
Chinese: 他把她的秘密告诉了他的朋友。

English: This is a secret. Don't tell anyone.
Pin Yin: Zhè shì ge mìmì, bù yào gàosu biérén. (also renhe ren)
Chinese: 这是个秘密，不要告诉别人。

English: These seats are set aside for the elderly.
Pin Yin: bǎ zhè xiē zuòwèi liú gěi lǎorén. (no ba more like a command)

English: When I was studying in college, I lived in the school dormitory.
Pin Yin: Niàn dàxué de shíhou, wǒ zhù zài xuéxiào sùshè. (also nian (dialect) -> du)
Chinese: 念大学的时候，我住在学校宿舍。

English: Four people live in one dorm.
Pin Yin: Yī gè sùshè zhù sì gè rén.

English: Regrettably, he failed.
He stole my bag.
Pin Yin: Tā qiǎng le wǒ de bāo.

English: That person used a gun to rob the bank.
Pin Yin: Nà ge rén yòng qiāng qiǎng yínháng.

English: I have a handgun.
He carelessly fired a gun.
Pin Yin: tā suíbiàn kāi le yī qiāng. (also ye ba qiang)

English: He casually ate a few bites and just left.
Pin Yin: Tā suíbiàn chī le jǐ kǒu jiù zǒu le.
Chinese: 他随便吃了几口就走了。

English: His attire is very casual.
They're wearing the same clothes.
I'm living in the west part of America.
There are four children here.
He remembered her name.
Pin Yin: Tā jìzhu le tā de míngzi. (also jide)

English: He doesn't believe in fate.
He can teach very well.
The students like the teacher's way of teaching.
Pin Yin: Xuéshengmen xǐhuan lǎoshī jiāoshū de fāngshì.
Chinese: 学生们喜欢老师教书的方式。

English: Can foreigners teach at a university in China?
Pin Yin: Wàiguórén kěyǐ zài Zhōngguó de dàxué lǐ jiāoshū ma?
Chinese: 外国人可以在中国的大学里教书吗？

English: He teaches at a middle school in Shanghai.
He earns his living by teaching.

Pin Yin: Wǒmen xuéxiào yǒu hěn duō hǎiwài liúxuéshēng.
Chinese: 我们学校有很多海外留学生。

English: Her parents very dearly love her, she feels very happy/blessed.
Pin Yin: Fùmǔ hěn téng tā, tā gǎnjué hěn xìngfú. (also tengai)
Chinese: 父母很疼她，她感觉很幸福。

English: My feet hurt very much.
The children washed (those people's) feet.
Pin Yin: háizimen xǐ le tāmen de jiǎo. (also naxie ren)

English: Please wash your hands clean.
My job is to wash dishes.
I've eaten one bowl of rice.
Pin Yin: Wǒ chī le yī wǎn fàn.

English: He only needs something to eat, he is very satisfied☺.
Pin Yin: Zhǐ yào yǒu fàn chī, tā jiù hěn mǎnzú le. (also manyi)
Chinese: 只要有饭吃他就很满足了。

English: You only need to work hard, you will naturally succeed.
Pin Yin: Zhǐ yào nǐ nǔlì, zìrán huì chénggōng.
Chinese: 只要你努力，自然会成功。

English: Having finished eating, he got ready to go to work.
Pin Yin: Chī wán fàn, tā zhǔnbèi qù shàngbān le.
Chinese: 吃完饭，他准备去上班了。

English: I use credit cards to buy things.
I accept any criticism.

Pin Yin: Zhè shì wǒ de diànhuà hàomǎ.

English: Please tell me the telephone number.

Pin Yin: Zhè gè juédìng fúhé xiànzài de qíngkuàng.
Chinese: 这个决定符合现在的情况。

English: His work has recently been going very smoothly.
Pin Yin: Tā de gōngzuò zuìjìn hěn shùnlì.

English: He smoothly completed this task.
Pin Yin: Tā shùnlì de wánchéng le zhè xiàng rènwu. (also ta hen shunli wancheng ...)
Chinese: 他顺利地完成了这项任务。

English: I hope the two nations cooperate smoothly.
They cooperated and finished this design.
Pin Yin: Tāmen hézuò wánchéng le zhè xiàng shèjì.
Chinese: 他们合作完成了这项设计。

English: I'm afraid there's no way you can marry her.
Pin Yin: wǒ pà nǐ méifǎ gēn tā jiéhūn.

English: They have the same kind of notions.
Pin Yin: Tāmen yǒu tóngyàng de guānniàn. (tongyang / tongyiyang / yiyang)

English: Behind his way of doing things, was another purpose.
Pin Yin: Tā zuòfǎ de bèihòu, biéyǒu mùdì.
Chinese: 他做法的背后，别有目的。

English:
I believe that behind every thing we should do,
there's always something we want to do.
Pin Yin:
wǒ rènwéi wǒmen gāi zuò de měi jiàn shì bèihòu,
zǒng yǒu shénme wǒmen xiǎng zuò de.
Chinese: 我认为我们该做的每件事背后，总有什么我们想做的...

English: He's the king.

Pin Yin: Hǎo péngyou yǒu shí yě huì yǒu máodùn.
Chinese: 好朋友有时也会有矛盾。

English: There is contradiction between his wording.
Pin Yin:
Tā de shuōfǎ zhījiān hěn máodùn.
(also hen you maodun) (also no zhijian) (zhong1 is wrong)

English: Before, it was very easy to obtain a visa.
Obtaining a visa is very important.
He applied for a visa.

Pin Yin: Wǒ gěi Xiǎo Mǎ jièshào le yī ge nǚpéngyou.
Chinese: 我给小马介绍了一个女朋友。

English: They're singing.
Singing is a kind of entertainment.
Pin Yin: Chànggē shì yī zhǒng yúlè. (yiyang usually just for "same")

English: Singing karaoke is a way of entertaining yourself.
Pin Yin: Chàng K shì zìwǒ yúlè de fāngshì. (no ziji) (also de yi zhong fangshi)

English: We also need entertainment outside of work.
Pin Yin: Zài gōngzuò zhī yú wǒmen yě xūyào yúlè.
Chinese: 在工作之余我们也需要娱乐。

English: We are all looking forward to seeing you and your family.
Pin Yin: wǒmen dōu qīdài kàndào nǐ hé nǐ de jiārén .
Chinese: 我们都期待看到你和你的家人。

English: I am look forward to being able to receive your letter very soon.
Pin Yin: wǒ qīdài hěn kuài jiù néng shōudào nǐ de xìn. (need jiu)
Chinese: 我期待很快就能收到你的信。

English: It's really good to (initiate this task) ourselves.

This company has 200 employees. (formal)
Pin Yin: Zhè jiā gōngsī yǒu 200 míng yuángōng.

English: It's very dark in the room.

Pin Yin: Tā zū le yī jiān wūzi.

English: Two people are in the room.
They're sitting in front of the room/house.
Beijing is China's capital.

English beer is relatively bitter.
Foreigners drink a lot of beer.
Want some beer?

Pin Yin: Wǒ xǐhuan gēn péngyou yīqǐ hē píjiǔ.
Chinese: 我喜欢跟朋友一起喝啤酒。

English: I like to drink beer.
I want another glass of beer.
Pin Yin: wǒ xiǎng zài lái yī bēi píjiǔ .

English: She would not like to drink beer.
Beer is very delicious.
This subject is very simple.
Pin Yin: Zhè gè tímù hěn jiǎndān. (huati only subject for talking)

English: We need to treat work with a serious attitude.
Pin Yin: Duìdài gōngzuò, tàidu yào rènzhēn. (also women duidai ...)

English: I am reviewing in the library.

Pin Yin: Wǒ yào fùxí qiánmiàn shí kè.

English: The exam is soon, Xiao Ma is seriously reviewing.
Pin Yin: Kuài kǎoshì le, Xiǎo Mǎ zài rènzhēn fùxí.
Chinese: 快考试了，小马在认真复习。

English: It's important to review every day.

Pin Yin: Kǎoshì qián yào fùxí, fǒuzé hěn nán tōng'guò.
Chinese: 考试前要复习，否则很难通过。

English: These past few days, I have too many things on my mind.
Pin Yin: zhè jǐ tiān, wǒ nǎodài lǐ de shìqing tài duō le.
Chinese: 这几天我脑袋里的事情太多了。

English: He does trading (business) work. (formal)

Pin Yin: Wén Qiáng jīngyíng zhè yī jiā màoyì gōngsī.
Chinese: 文强经营着一家贸易公司。

English: Xiao Qiang likes internet chat.

The kitchen is very clean.

Pin Yin: Lǎoshī měitiān jiǎnchá xuésheng de zuòyè.
Chinese: 老师每天检查学生的作业。

English: The teacher is standing behind him.

Pin Yin: Měi gè rén dōu yào hùxiāng zūnzhòng.

English: I respect his idea.

Pin Yin: Tāmen shì rénshì bùmén de yuángōng.

Chinese: 有什么方法可以让我变瘦？

English: After working, he obviously got thinner.
Pin Yin: Gōngzuò hòu, tā míngxiǎn shòu le.

English: You're too thin, you should eat more.
Pin Yin: Nǐ tài shòu le, gāi duō chī diǎnr. (also chi duo)

English: He is thinner than I.

Pin Yin: wǒmen de lǎoshī huì gěi wǒmen chūnántí.
Chinese: 我们的老师会给我们出难题。

English: Through thinking deeply, I solved this tough problem.
Pin Yin:
Jīngguò sīkǎo, wǒ jiějué le zhè dào nántí.
(Jīngguò active "through", tongguo passive "through")
Chinese: 经过思考，我解决了这道难题。

English: The teacher gave everyone an analysis of this difficult problem.
Pin Yin: Lǎoshī gěi dàjiā fēnxī le zhè gè nántí. (also zhe dao)
Chinese: 老师给大家分析了这个难题。

English: I work at a television station.
It's exactly six o'clock.

Pin Yin:
tā yī zhěng wǎn dōu zài kū.
(Also no yi, yi like one time) (Also zheng ge wanshang)

English: My mom is tidying the room.
Mom is tidying the room.
This guy is very silent/taciturn.

English: We kept silent.
Let's keep in touch, ok?

Pin Yin: wǒ xīwàng wǒmen néng bǎochí liánxì.
Chinese: 我希望我们能保持联系。

English: We must keep the household traditions.
Chinese: 我们必须保持家庭传统。

English: He's an non-traditional man.
Pin Yin: Tā shì gè fǎn chuántǒng de rén. (also fandui = disagree/less deep)

English: My classmate doesn't have a textbook.
Pin Yin: Wǒ de tóngxué méi yǒu kèběn.

English:
Is this a textbook?
No, it's not. It's a novel.
Pin Yin:
Zhè shì kè běn ma?
Bú shì. Shì xiǎoshuō.
Chinese:
A这是课本吗?
B不是。是小说。

English: Does he have a textbook?
I don't have a textbook.
Ms. Zhou would like to buy a textbook.
Do you have a textbook?
Whose textbook is this?
How's this textbook?
I would like to buy a textbook.
Where can I buy a Mandarin textbook?
This is my textbook.
I will buy a textbook.
She will buy a Mandarin textbook.
The students sometimes forget to bring their textbook.
Pin Yin: Xuéshengmen yǒu shí wàng dài kèběn.

English: In my opinion, this textbook is not good.
Pin Yin: Běnrén rènwéi, zhè gè kèběn bù hǎo.
Chinese: 本人认为,这个课本不好。

English: The quality of air in the city is very very bad.
Pin Yin: Chéngshì lǐ de kōngqì zhìliàng fēicháng bù hǎo.
Chinese: 城市里的空气质量非常不好。

English: Without air, people can't exist.
She's enjoying the fresh air.
Pin Yin: Tā zài xiǎngshòu zìrán de kōngqì.

English: My son saves one yuan every day.
Pin Yin: Érzi měi tiān cún yī kuài qián.

English: The boss requires strictness for my work.
Pin Yin: Lǎobǎn duì wǒ de gōngzuò yāoqiú yángé.
Chinese: 老板对我的工作要求严格。

English: That teacher is very strict.

Pin Yin: Zhè gè lǎoshī duì xuésheng hěn yángé.
Chinese: 这个老师对学生很严格。

English: My coworker speaks Japanese very well.
Pin Yin: Wǒ tóngshì de Rìyǔ shuō de hěn hǎo.
Chinese: 我同事的日语说得很好。

English: Is there anyone here who can speak Japanese?
Pin Yin: zhèr yǒu rén shuō rìyǔ ma?

English: My friend doesn't speak Japanese too well.
Pin Yin: Wǒ péngyou de Rìyǔ shuōde bù tài hǎo.
Chinese: 我朋友的日语说得不太好。

English: My manager speaks Japanese very well.
Pin Yin: Wǒ de jīnglǐ Rìyǔ shuōde hěn hǎo.
Chinese: 我的经理日语说得很好。

English: Ask him if he can speak Japanese.
Pin Yin: wèn wèn tā, huìbuhuì shuō rìyǔ .

English: He's stealing a wallet.

Pin Yin: qǐng bāng wǒ zhǎo yīxià wǒ de qiánbāo.
Chinese: 请帮我找一下我的钱包。

English: It's raining outside.
I reckon it will rain tonight.
It seems that it's going to rain!
With the rain, the weather is more cold☺.
It will rain soon!
Pin Yin: tiān kuài yào xiàyǔ le. (hui a little strange)

English: I think it's going to rain☺.
Pin Yin: Wǒ juéde tiān yào xiàyǔ le. (also more certain: hui)

English: It looks like it will rain.
Will it rain tomorrow?
I said it could possibly rain.
Pin Yin: wǒ shuō le kěnéng yào xiàyǔ .

English:
If it rains tomorrow, I'll just stay at home.
If it rains tomorrow, I'll stay at home.
Pin Yin: rúguǒ míngtiān xiàyǔ , wǒ jiù dāi zài jiā .
Chinese: 如果明天下雨，我就待在家。

English: It often rains here.
He said that he was afraid it would rain.
Pin Yin: tā shuō tā pà tiān huì xiàyǔ. (also yao)

English: He put out his views on this matter.
Pin Yin:
Tā zhēnduì zhè jiàn shì fābiǎo kànfǎ.
(no ba3, it's about this, not to this)
(dui = duiyu = zhendui (pinpoints))
Chinese: 他针对这件事发表看法。

English: My boyfriend and I go traveling together.
Pin Yin: Nánpéngyou tóng wǒ yīqǐ qù lǚxíng.
Chinese: 男朋友同我一起去旅行。

English: We went traveling by car.
I want to travel in Europe.
She's gone traveling by herself.
Pin Yin: Tā yī gè rén qù lǚxíng.

English: A friend and I went traveling.

Pin Yin: wǒ méi yǒu yī ge yuànyì gēn wǒ yīqǐ lǚxíng de rén.
Chinese: 我没有一个愿意跟我一起旅行的人。

English: The story books they read are very popular.
Pin Yin: Tāmen kàn de gùshi shū hěn rèmén.
Chinese: 她们看的故事书很热门。

English: Environmental protection is a popular subject.
Pin Yin: Huánjìng bǎohù shì yī gè rèmén huàtí.
Chinese: 环境保护是一个热门话题。

English: I've lost my wallet.
He threw a piece of meat to a dog.
Pin Yin: tā diū le kuài ròu gěi yī tiáo gǒu .

English: A book dropped down from the table.
Pin Yin: Shū cóng zhuōzi shàng diào xiàlái le.

English: You may be right, but I am against your ideas.
Pin Yin: nǐ kěnéng shì duì de, dàn wǒ hé nǐ yìjiàn xiāngfǎn.
Chinese: 你可能是对的，但我和你意见相反。

English: Her legs are very slender.
It's quiet in the library.
We need to keep quiet in hospitals.
Pin Yin: Wǒmen zài yīyuàn lǐ yào bǎochí ānjìng.
Chinese: 我们在医院里要保持安静。

English: Keep quiet!
Why are you so quiet/peaceful?
This street is very quiet.
The students have gotten out of class.

Pin Yin: Xiàkè hòu, tā zhíjiē jiù huí jiā le.
Chinese: 下课后，他直接就回家了。

English: Our views are unanimous.
Homework's done☺.
I've finished my homework earlier.
Pin Yin: Wǒ de zuòyè zǎo jiù zuòwán le.

English: There are five people here in total.
Pin Yin: Zhèli yīgòng yǒu wǔ gè rén.

English: Altogether there are four people in his family.
Pin Yin: Tā jiā yīgòng yǒu sì kǒu rén.

English: He's a truck driver.
It's gradually getting dark ☺.
China is planning to implement political reforms.
Chinese: 中国计划进行政治改革。

English: This company is reforming some old systems/regulations.
Pin Yin: Zhè jiā gōngsī zhèngzài gǎigé yīxiē lǎo zhìdù.
Chinese: 这家公司正在改革一些老制度。

English: The legal system of the U.S. is highly developed.
Pin Yin: Měiguó de fǎlǜ zhìdù hěn fādá.
Chinese: 美国的法律制度很发达。

English: They're learning through practice.
Theory comes from practice.
How many countries are there in Asia altogether?
Pin Yin: Yàzhōu yīgòng yǒu jǐ gè guójiā?

English: This RMB note is fake.
Pin Yin: Zhè zhāng rénmínbì shì jiǎ de.

English: Vocabulary learning is the foundation for sentence learning.
Pin Yin: Cíhuì xuéxí shì jùzi xuéxí de jīchǔ.
Chinese: 词汇学习是句子学习的基础。

English: The vocabulary the students are learning now, is hard to remember.
Pin Yin: Xuéshengmen zhèngzài xué de cíhuì hěn nán jì.
Chinese: 学生们正在学的词汇很难记。

English: He wrote this down in his notebook.
Pin Yin: tā bǎ zhè jì zài tā de bǐjìběn shàng .
Chinese: 他把这记在他的笔记本上。

English: He lacks confidence.
He's changing the TV channel.
His words hurt her.
Pin Yin: Tā de huà shānghài le tā.

English: His behavior caused her very great harm.
Pin Yin: Tā de xíngwéi duì tā zàochéng le hěn dà de shānghài.
Chinese: 他的行为对她造成了很大的伤害。

English: The toilet is very clean.
This is the men's toilet.
The patient may die at any time.
Did you understand?
I heard/understood.

Without water, we cannot exist.
If it were not for water, we could not live.
This city's industry is very developed.
Pin Yin: Zhè zuò chéngshì de gōngyè hěn fādá.
Chinese: 这座城市的工业很发达。

English: Many people work in industrial cities.
Pin Yin: xǔduō rén zài gōngyè chéngshì gōngzuò .
Chinese: 许多人在工业城市工作。

English: Industry as we know it today didn't exist in that era.
Pin Yin: wǒmen jīntiān suǒ rènshi de gōngyè zài nà ge shídài bù cúnzài .
Chinese: 我们今天所认识的工业在那个时代不存在。

English: In this era, having no knowledge is no good.
Pin Yin: Zài zhè gè shídài, méiyǒu zhīshi shì bù xíng de.
Chinese: 在这个时代，没有知识是不行的。

English: She fell asleep leaning on a chair.
Pin Yin:
Tā kào zhe yǐzi shuì zháo le.
(kao is leaning head/back, pa is supported underneath)

English: This is a comfortable chair.
Pin Yin: zhè shì zhāng shūfu de yǐzi .

English: He is the king of a country. (formal)
Pin Yin: Tā shì yī guó zhī jūn. (also de jun)

English: His speech is very clear.
She gave a speech at the meeting.

Pin Yin: Rúguǒ xiāngxìn nánrén de huà, zhū yě huì shàng shù.
Chinese: 如果相信男人的话，猪也会上树。

English: In this match, he achieved victory.
Pin Yin: Zài zhè cì bǐsài zhōng, tā qǔdé le shènglì.
Chinese: 在这次比赛中，他取得了胜利。
